## Interactive Scatterplot

### Instructions:
1. Use the dropdown menu to filter by Electric Vehicle (EV) Type.
2. Hover over the dots to see detailed information about each vehicle, including make, model, and CAFV eligibility status.

<div>
  <label for="ev-type">Filter by EV Type:</label>

    <option value="Battery Electric Vehicle (BEV)">Battery Electric Vehicle (BEV)</option>
    <option value="Plug-in Hybrid Electric Vehicle (PHEV)">Plug-in Hybrid Electric Vehicle (PHEV)</option>
    
  </select>
</div>

<div id="scatterplot"></div>
